javadoc: A listener to be notified of {@link ThreadedTableModel} loading changes.

methods.javadoc: Called when the model has new data to be loaded, but has not yet started the load process.
methods.name: loadPending
methods.comment: Called when the model has new data to be loaded, but has not yet started the load process.

methods.javadoc: Called when the table begins to load new data.
methods.name: loadingStarted
methods.comment: Called when the table begins to load new data.

methods.javadoc:
Called when the table is done loading data.
@param wasCancelled true if the load was cancelled.
methods.name: loadingFinished
methods.comment: Called when the table is done loading data.

params.name: wasCancelled
params.comment: true if the load was cancelled.

name: ThreadedTableModelListener
comment: A listener to be notified of ThreadedTableModel loading changes.
